name: PHASESpatialMixerDefinition
desc: An audio-layering object that produces environmental effects and plays sound with a 3D position and orientation.

items.name: init(spatialPipeline: PHASESpatialPipeline)
items.desc: Creates a mixer with the designated spatial pipeline.

items.name: init(spatialPipeline: PHASESpatialPipeline, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a named mixer with the designated spatial pipeline.

items.name: var spatialPipeline: PHASESpatialPipeline
items.desc: An object that adds sound layers for environmental effects.

items.name: var distanceModelParameters: PHASEDistanceModelParameters?
items.desc: An effect that changes sound as it carries over a distance.

items.name: var listenerDirectivityModelParameters: PHASEDirectivityModelParameters?
items.desc: A data set that determines how well the listener hears depending on its direction relative to a sound source.

items.name: var sourceDirectivityModelParameters: PHASEDirectivityModelParameters?
items.desc: A data set that directs sound such that it's louder when directed at the listener.
